mapper.insert: INSERT INTO obo (member_no, member_name, member_phone, member_email, obo_title, obo_content, obo_inquiryType, obo_movieType, obo_answer, obo_status, obo_createDate) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{oboTitle}, #{oboContent}, #{oboInquiryType}, #{oboMovieType}, #{oboAnswer}, #{oboStatus}, #{oboCreateDate})
mapper.select: SELECT obo_no,member_no,member_name,member_phone,member_email,obo_title, obo_content,obo_inquiryType,obo_movieType,obo_answer,obo_status,obo_createDate FROM obo ORDER BY obo_no DESC
